name: Compelling
description: Elementary manipulation of phenomena within the Arcanum’ s purview, enough to activate them and / or impart directions.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Compelling.

name: Knowing
description: Gain mystical knowledge about and understanding of phenomena within the Arcanum’ s purview.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Knowing.

name: Unveiling
description: Gain sensory perception of phenomena within the Arcanum’ s purview.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Unveiling.

name: Ruling
description: Exert elementary command and control over phenomena within the purview of the Arcanum. Atlanteans called this the Practice of Ruling.

name: Shielding
description: Protect a target against attacks, usually by providing points of armor.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Shielding.

name: Veiling
description: Conceal, camouflage or hide phenomena within the Arcanum’ s purview from scrutiny.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Veiling.

name: Fraying
description: Injure a target. Atlanteans called this the Practice of Fraying.

name: Perfecting
description: Fortify, bolster or improve phenomena within the Arcanum’ s purview.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Perfecting.

name: Weaving
description: Alter the capabilities or functions of phenomena within the Arcanum’ s purview.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Weaving.

name: Patterning
description: Transform phenomena within the Arcanum’s purview into related phenomena or shapes, or replace their capabilities or functions with different ones.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Patterning.

name: Unraveling
description: Significantly injure a target, degrade its capabilities or negatively transform it.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Unraveling.

name: Making
description: Create phenomena within the Arcanum’s purview from nothing.Atlanteans called this the Practice of Making.

name: Unmaking
description: Destroy or mutilate a target. Atlanteans called this the Practice of Unmaking.
